A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After watching this movie\, I say that The Last Jedi is a MILE better than The Force Awakens. Unlike\, Episode VII\, which was basically the plot of A New Hope\, The Last Jedi is a fresh take on a Star Wars episode. Rian Johnson was able to use bits of humor and action to make this Episode one of the best since The Empire Strikes Back. The action and visuals were amazing\, and there were so many plot twists (no-spoilers!) that I was on the edge of my seat seconds after the Opening Crawl finished! 5/5 stars :)
